org.aludratest.data
Interface DataConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataConfigurationImpl
public interface DataConfiguration

Configuration component for special data markers. The markers are special keywords that allow a String with the same value to be treated as null, as empty, or as an "ALL"-match.

Author:
falbrech

Method Summary
 String getAllMarker()
          Returns the marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as ALL-match.
 String getEmptyMarker()
          Returns the marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as empty.
 String getNullMarker()
          Returns the marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as null.
 

Method Detail

getNullMarker

String getNullMarker()
Returns the marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as null. By default, this is the string "NULL".

Returns:
The marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as null.

getEmptyMarker

String getEmptyMarker()
Returns the marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as empty. By default, this is the string "EMPTY".

Returns:
The marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as empty.

getAllMarker

String getAllMarker()
Returns the marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as ALL-match. By default, this is the string "ALL".

Returns:
The marker string to be used as keyword for treating values as ALL-match.
